sentences.en: A string of beads not only a luxuriance and levity represent, but also represent individual lifestyle.
sentences.cn: 手工串珠艺术不仅是华丽多变的生活表现, 更是个人生活品位的传达.

sentences.en: At the time, Arnold had disapproved of such levity.
sentences.cn: 那时候的阿诺德对这种轻浮行为很看不惯。

sentences.en: Better to read little with thought than much with levity and quickness.
sentences.cn: 读书与其多而草率,不如少而精研.

sentences.en: But what the authors mean by " levity " is really a sense of " lightness. "
sentences.cn: 但是,那里作者对 “ 轻佻 ” 定义其实是一种心情 “ 简易 ” 的感觉.

sentences.en: His remarks injected a note of levity into the proceedings.
sentences.cn: 他的话将一丝轻率带入了议事过程中.

sentences.en: I am sure foreigners must think our levity is baffling.
sentences.cn: 外国人肯定认为我们的轻浮举止不可理喻.

sentences.en: It was cruel levity in you to do that.
sentences.cn: 那本是你狠心轻薄的行为.

sentences.en: On this latter point he felt almost certain, knowing her freedom from levity of character.
sentences.cn: 这后一点他简直确信不疑, 因为他了解她的性格绝不是轻浮的.

sentences.en: To begin with, he accused of a certain levity in regard to the gods.
sentences.cn: 首先,有人指责说, 他对待诸神略显轻浮并偷走了他们的秘密.

sentences.en: Your levity is unseemly at this time.
sentences.cn: 在这种场合,你的轻率举动是不得体的.

words.tran_cn: 使轻轻浮起；使飘浮空中

trans.tran_cn: 欠考虑，不慎重，轻率，轻浮
trans.tran_en: lack of respect or seriousness when you are dealing with something serious
